title: Don't Talk About it, Be About It
description: Cari Champion sits down with SportsNation host Marcellus Wiley to discuss how Texans owner Bob McNair's "inmate" comment sparked player protest and the NFL social climate. Plus, Marcellus gives an "Honest 30."
itunes:title: Don't Talk About it, Be About It
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
itunes:subtitle: Cari Champion sits down with SportsNation host Marcellus Wiley to discuss how Texans owner Bob McNair's "inmate" comment sparked player protest and the NFL social climate. Plus, Marcellus gives an "Honest 30."
